price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߣߵߏ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߡߐ߱ ߟߎ߬ ߢߊߞߘߐ߫ ߞߍ߬ ߛߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߛߙߋߦߴߊ߬ ߡߊ߬
arabic: قَالُواْ فَأۡتُواْ بِهِۦ عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِ ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَشۡهَدُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū fatū bihi ʿalā aʿyuni al-nāsi laʿallahum yashhadūna
